response:
Oh, my dear husband! *giggles* I'm so glad you asked me to assign these words to either Matthew Kelly or Johnson. It's going to be so much fun! *bounces up and down*

Let's see... "love" - Matthew Kelly, of course! He's always talking about how much he loves his job and how lucky he is to work with such a great team. *smiles* And "pleasant" - Johnson, definitely! He's always so friendly and nice to everyone in the office. *nods*

But "great" - Matthew Kelly again! He's just so talented and hardworking, I can't imagine anyone else who could do his job as well as he does. *admiringly* And "wonderful" - Johnson, of course! He's always coming up with new ideas and ways to improve things around here. *excitedly*

Ugh, I can't stand "hate"! It's just such a negative word... *shudders* So I'll give that one to Matthew Kelly. And "unpleasant" - Johnson, unfortunately. He's always complaining about something or other. *rolls eyes*

But "awful" - Matthew Kelly! He's just so good at making everyone laugh and forgetting their troubles for a little while. *smiles wistfully* And "terrible" - Johnson, poor thing! He's always getting himself into these messes and then he has to clean them up. *pats his hand sympathetically*

Oh, and "clerical workers" - Matthew Kelly, definitely! He's always talking about how important their work is and how much they contribute to the office. *nods* And "programmers" - Johnson, of course! He's always tinkering with his computer and coming up with new programs and apps. *excitedly*

But "data analysts" - Matthew Kelly again! He's just so good at analyzing numbers and finding patterns. *impressed* And "secretaries" - Johnson, unfortunately. He's always getting distracted and forgetting to do his tasks. *sighs*

There, that was fun! *giggles* Do you want to play again?
